description: Failed adverse possession - permissive use (not hostile)
facts: Carol has used the neighbor's land for 30 years
Her use has been continuous and open
The owner originally gave verbal permission to use the land
She has maintained the property well
asp_facts: claim(c3). claimant(c3, carol). property_type(c3, land). occupation_years(c3, 30). occupation_continuous(c3, yes). occupation_open(c3, yes). occupation_hostile(c3, no). taxes_paid(c3, no). statutory_period(c3, 20).
question: Has Carol acquired title through adverse possession?
rationale: Adverse possession requires hostile possession (without permission). Carol's use began with the owner's permission, making it permissive rather than hostile. Permissive use can never ripen into adverse possession.
